text.text_translated:
"The Life of Pi" tells an amazing story about a teenage boy from India named Pi. His ship sinks in the Pacific Ocean, so he is trapped on a small boat with a very dangerous tiger.
The writer is Yann Martel from Canada. This is his third book and it came out in 2001. The book sold more than seven million copies and won many prizes. You can read it in 41 languages.
Martel's father worked for his country in other countries. So, when Martel was a child, he lived in many countries. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.
